content: Bluebridge Romance is the third of the Black Myth: Wukong Drinks you will find in your through. Located in the game's third location, each sip gives a solid healing boost and a nice extra buff to go along with it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bluebridge_Romance.md', within the main section titled 'Bluebridge Romance'.
The content is as follows:
Bluebridge Romance is the third of the Black Myth: Wukong Drinks you will find in your through. Located in the game's third location, each sip gives a solid healing boost and a nice extra buff to go along with it.
